scripts.build: mkdir -p types/idl types/types && cd programs/ApeOrDie && RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor build && cd ../.. && cp -f target/idl/ape_or_die.json types/idl/ApeOrDie.json && cp -f target/types/ape_or_die.ts types/types/ApeOrDie.ts && echo 'export * from "./types/ApeOrDie.js"' > index.js
scripts.program-id:main: RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor run --provider.cluster mainnet bun run scripts/getProgramId.ts
scripts.program-id:dev: RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor run --provider.cluster devnet bun run scripts/getProgramId.ts
scripts.init:ApeOrDie_main: ENV=main RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor run --provider.cluster mainnet init_ApeOrDie
scripts.init:ApeOrDie_dev: ENV=dev RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor run --provider.cluster devnet init_ApeOrDie
scripts.deploy:ApeOrDie_dev: RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor deploy --program-name ApeOrDie --program-keypair target/deploy/ape_or_die_keypair.json --provider.wallet wallet-keypair.json --provider.cluster devnet
scripts.deploy:ApeOrDie_main: RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor deploy --program-name ApeOrDie --program-keypair ApeOrDie-keypair.json --provider.wallet id.json --provider.cluster mainnet
scripts.deploy_buffer:ApeOrDie_dev: solana program deploy --buffer recover.json --url devnet target/deploy/ApeOrDie.so
scripts.init:main: ENV=main RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor run --provider.cluster mainnet init_ApeOrDie
scripts.init:dev: ENV=dev RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor run --provider.cluster devnet init_ApeOrDie
scripts.listen:events:dev: ENV=dev RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor run --provider.cluster devnet listen-events
scripts.listen:events:main: ENV=main RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly-2025-04-14 anchor run --provider.cluster mainnet listen-events
